message.frozendawn.freeze.biting: The cold is biting into you...
message.frozendawn.freeze.extreme: Extreme cold! Find shelter or warmth!
message.frozendawn.suffocate.lightheaded: You feel lightheaded... the air is thinning.
message.frozendawn.suffocate.nausea: Your vision swims. You can't breathe.
message.frozendawn.suffocate.fading: Your limbs go numb. Everything is fading...
message.frozendawn.suffocate.dying: There is no air. You are suffocating.
advancement.frozendawn.root.title: The Sun Grows Cold
advancement.frozendawn.root.description: The apocalypse has begun. Earth drifts from its star.
advancement.frozendawn.phase2.title: A Dying World
advancement.frozendawn.phase2.descriptio: Phase 2: Water freezes and vegetation begins to die.
advancement.frozendawn.phase3.title: The Long Night
advancement.frozendawn.phase3.descriptio: Phase 3: Permanent storms rage. The surface grows lethal.
advancement.frozendawn.phase4.title: Deep Freeze
advancement.frozendawn.phase4.descriptio: Phase 4: Even the earth itself freezes solid.
advancement.frozendawn.phase5.title: Eternal Winter
advancement.frozendawn.phase5.descriptio: Phase 5: The sun is a distant memory. Only the deep earth holds warmth.
advancement.frozendawn.phase6.title: The Last Breath
advancement.frozendawn.phase6.descriptio: Phase 6: The atmosphere freezes and collapses. There is no air left to breathe. ...did you need oxygen?
advancement.frozendawn.last_light.title: Last Light
advancement.frozendawn.last_light.descri: Place a Geothermal Core below Y=0. The thermal anchor holds.
advancement.frozendawn.classified_inform: Discover an ORSA document. What did they do?
advancement.frozendawn.insulated_clothin: Equip a full set of insulated clothing. Fashion? No. Survival? Barely.
Equip a full set of heated insulation. You're basically a walking furnace.
advancement.frozendawn.eva_suit.title: One Small Step
advancement.frozendawn.eva_suit.descript: Equip a full EVA suit. Space called. You answered.
message.frozendawn.nether_severed: The dimensional link is dead. The Nether is unreachable.
advancement.frozendawn.nether_severed.de: Attempt to light a portal after Phase 5. No way out now.
message.frozendawn.heat.sweating: You're sweating... in a frozen apocalypse. Really?
message.frozendawn.heat.unbearable: The heat is unbearable! Maybe fewer heaters?
message.frozendawn.heat.cooking: You are literally cooking alive. In an ice age.
death.attack.frozendawn.hyperthermia: %1$s was cooked alive by their own heaters
advancement.frozendawn.too_hot_to_handle: Overheat in a world that's freezing to death. The irony is not lost on you.
advancement.frozendawn.insulation_both_w: Overheat while wearing insulated armor near your own heaters. You marinated yourself.
advancement.frozendawn.found_villager_jo: Find a villager's journal in the ruins.
advancement.frozendawn.found_orsa_bullet: Discover an ORSA Public Safety Bulletin.
advancement.frozendawn.found_vasik_log.d: Find Dr. Vasik's personal research log.
advancement.frozendawn.found_incident_re: Uncover ORSA Technical Incident Report TIR-2042-1171. Now you know everything.
